Cheat Sheet

A B c d e f G h i j k l M N o P q R s t U V w x y z

Azure CLI

  • npm install azure-cli -g
  • azure site list

Builds

  • Kudu
    • <hostname>.scm.azurewebsites.net
    • https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki
    • https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki/Customizing-deployments
  • Travis CI
    • https://travis-ci.org/sihugh/sihugh.github.io/builds
    • https://travis-ci.org
  • Visual Studio Online
    • https://sihugh.visualstudio.com/
    • https://visualstudio.com/

Git

  • git remote set-url origin git@github.com:sihugh/<repo>.git

Markdown

  • Kramdown syntax
    • http://kramdown.gettalong.org/syntax.html
  • Style guide
    • http://tirania.org/blog/archive/2014/Sep-30.html

nginx

  • /etc/init.d/nginx start
  • nginx stop
  • nginx restart

Nuget Package Manager

  • install-package <package name>

Powershell

  • write-host "Something with a $variable in it that you want inlined"

  • write-host 'Something with a $sign in it that you want rendered'

  • Split-Path $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Path
    • Current directory (does not end in slash)
  • Set-Service -name "SPTimerv3" -ComputerName "myhost" -State "Running"
  • Get-Service -Name "SPTimerv3" -ComputerName "myhost" | Set-Service -Status Running
    • http://ss64.com/ps/set-service.html

Rails

  • rails generate controller welcome index
  • rails generate scaffold HighScore game:string score:integer
    • http://guides.rubyonrails.org/command_line.html
  • rails destroy scaffold HighScore
  • http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11889048/is-there-documentation-for-the-rails-column-types

Rake

  • rake -T lists tasks with descriptions
  • rake -P lists all tasks and dependencies

Ruby Gems

  • gem: --no-document +(in ~/.gemrc)

Ubuntu

  • Inital setup
    • https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/initial-server-setup-with-ubuntu-14-04
  • Next
    • https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/additional-recommended-steps-for-new-ubuntu-14-04-servers
  • Free disk space
    • df -h
  • Memory usage
    • free -m
  • Swap file etcâ€¦
    • fallocate -l 4G /swapfile

    https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-add-swap-on-ubuntu-14-04

  • Reboot
    • reboot
  • Power off
    • poweroff
  • Change Password
    • passwd
  • Running Services
    • service --status-all | grep postgres

Vim / Vi

  • :set paste
  • :set nopaste
  • Alt-PgDn

Alt-PgDn is the Resharper keyboard shortcut for "Proceed to next issue". This is a collection of programming tidbits, deployment issues and other techy bits and pieces I find interesting.
